subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Kyle Okposo, who announced Dec. 19 that he was leaving the University of Minnesota to join the Islanders organization, had a goal and an assist Wednesday to help the United States to a 5-1 victory over Kazakhstan at the world junior hockey championship in Liberec, Czech Republic.
